name: Pieces of Eight - An Android & iOS Game for Tablets!
blurb: Captain a ship! Build a Crew! Plunder Towns, Ships, & Forts! Collect Booty, and drink RUM!!!

rewards.reward: MATE - Thank you so much for helping us out!  We will send you a digital wallpaper image for your desktop or phone!  We will also include your name in the credits of the game!

COOK - Thank you so much for your contribution!  We will send you a digital wallpaper image for your desktop or phone!  We will also include your name in the credits of the game!  Additionally, we will send you a code to download a copy of Childhood's End for the iPad.  Childhood's End is a game developed by Pixel Brain Games and is an excellent Tower Defense game for the iPad.

DOCTOR - Thank you so much for helping us out!  We will send you a digital wallpaper image for your desktop or phone!  We will also include your name in the credits of the game!  Additionally, we will send you a code to download a copy of Three Dead Zed for the PC.  3DZ is an excellent Zombie Platformer for the PC developed by Gentlemen Squid Studios; an associate design company I collaborate with.

CARPENTER ((Early Bird)) - Thank you so much for being an early backer!  We will send you a digital wallpaper image for your desktop or phone!  We will also include your name in the credits of the game!  As one of the first 50 people to contribute to the project, you will receive a copy of the finished game and you will be the first to receive the Beta!

GUNNER - Thank you so much for helping us out!  We will send you a digital wallpaper image for your desktop or phone!  We will also include your name in the credits of the game!  You will also receive a copy of the finished game once it is completed!
BUCCANEER - Thank you so much for helping us out!  You will receive all of the above: A digital image, a code for Childhood's End, Three Dead Zed, and Pieces of Eight once it is completed!

QUARTERMASTER - Thank you so much for helping us out!  We will send you a digital wallpaper image for your desktop or phone, include your name in the credits, a copy of Pieces of Eight once it is completed, and a physical copy of the tabletop version of the game!  We can send the tabletop copy of the game early since it is completed.

CAPTAIN - Thank you so much for helping us out!  We will send you a digital wallpaper image for your desktop or phone, include your name in the credits, a copy of Pieces of Eight once it is completed, and a Signed, physical copy of the Deluxe Edition of the tabletop version of the game!  We can send the tabletop copy of the game early since it is completed.

CAPTAIN BLACKBEARD - Thank you so much for helping us out!  We will send you a digital wallpaper image for your desktop or phone, include your name in the credits, a copy of Pieces of Eight once it is completed, a Signed, physical copy of the Deluxe Edition of the tabletop version of the game, and a copy of Pieces of Eight - Buccaneers (The first expansion to the tabletop game)!  We can send the tabletop copies of the game early since they are completed.

CAPTAIN MORGAN - Thank you so much for helping us out!  We will send you a digital wallpaper image for your desktop or phone, include your name in the credits, a copy of Pieces of Eight once it is completed, a Signed, physical copy of the Deluxe Edition of the tabletop version of the game, and a Signed, copy of Pieces of Eight - Buccaneers & Pieces of Eight - ARGHHH!!! (The first & second expansion to the tabletop game!  We can send the tabletop copies of the game early since they are completed.

CAPTAIN BLACK BART - Thank you so much for helping us out!  You will receive everything listed above PLUS, I will draw your likeness into a card for the Pieces of Eight digital game!  See the description under "Drawing Rewards" for more information.

CAPTAIN EDWARD LOW - Thank you so much for helping us out!  You will receive everything listed above PLUS, I will draw your likeness into a card for the Pieces of Eight digital game and the physical copy of the game!    See the description under "Drawing Rewards" for more information.

CAPTAIN JACK - Thank you so much for helping us out!  You will receive everything listed above PLUS, Signed copies of my other games, ANTS! The Battle for the Backyard Has Begun! as well as The Blue & The Grey where I will also draw you as a Regular in the Confederate or Union army.  The Blue & The Grey is still in the works and should be released by September of 2013 but I will send you a digital copy of the image I draw before the game goes to the printers!

KING or QUEEN OF THE PIRATES! - Thank you so much for helping us out... seriously, I can't thank you enough! You will receive everything listed above PLUS a new iPad Mini or Samsung Galaxy Tab to play your new game!
